article.title: September 2014 Galaxy News
article.content:
Hello all,

A lot of cool stuff happened in the Galaxy in August, and even more cool stuff is coming: The September Galaxy Newsletter is out and here are some highlights:

  • Galaxy Events in Europe this Fall, lots of 'em.
  • G3: The Great GigaScience and Galaxy Workshop is happening Friday 19 September 2014 at The University of Melbourne.

  • New releases and communities - lots of 'em:

    • Galaxy
    • CloudMan
    • BioBlend
    • blend4j
    • The brand new Galaxy IPython
    • And, the Galaxy-UK Community was launched too.

And, as always, there are new papers, new jobs, and a double dose of new ToolShed contributions.

Happy September,

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
